main.name: Farzad Jafari
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: I enjoy learning, teaching and teamwork. I’m specialist in creating new ways for people to navigate them more quickly to the right path. I'm self-teacher and self- reliance in solving problems that others are afraid to confront. Sport is my hobby, I have energetic attitude to deal with new problems and to create new ways, I love to work in a happy, friendly and knowledgeable work place.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Senior Frontend Developer
work.description: My experiences in two years work on cloud-based online fax service are :At first, I fixed bugs and added new features in the web application withAngularJS.Then I migrated the web application from AngularJS to ReactJS.Also, I developed fax add-ons with Google App Script that integrates with GSuite[Google Sheets, Docs, and Gmail].

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
